hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# export variables
export GUI_PATH=${WORKSPACE} export LIBWEINTEK_PATH=${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/libweintek_${TRIGGER_PARAM_JOB_GROUP}/workspace/MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM} export DSERVER_PATH=${JENKINS_HOME}/jobs/dserver_${TRIGGER_PARAM_JOB_GROUP}/workspace/MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM} export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}/build-${TRIGGER_PARAM_JOB_GROUP}-branch
case $MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM in "cMT3000") export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi ;; "cMT-iv5") export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT-iv5/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi ;; "cMT-iv5-3000") export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi ;; esac
case $MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM in "cMT3000") export BUILD_LIBRARY_ONLY=off ;; "cMT-iv5") export BUILD_LIBRARY_ONLY=on ;; "cMT-iv5-3000") export BUILD_LIBRARY_ONLY=on ;; "Ubuntu") export BUILD_LIBRARY_ONLY=off ;; esac
case $MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM in "cMT-iv5-3000") export PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER=cMT-iv5 ;; *) export PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER=${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM} ;; esac
if [ "${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" = "cMT3000" ]; then export ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME=.c30 fi
if [ "${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" = "Ubuntu" ]; then export PATH=/opt/Qt5.4.2/5.4/gcc_64/bin:${PATH} fi
# clear artifacts
rm -f ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui* rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts mkdir ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts
# prepare out-of-source build
cd ${GUI_PATH}/build if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_GUI_BUILD_POLICY}" = "brandnew" ]; then rm -rf jenkins/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM} fi if [ ! -d "jenkins" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins fi if [ ! -d "jenkins/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM} fi cd jenkins/${MATRIX_AXIS_PLATFORM}
# generate makefile
cp ${GUI_PATH}/build/${PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER}/features.pri . ${GUI_PATH}/build/${PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER}/qmake_gui.sh ${GUI_PATH} ${LIBWEINTEK_PATH} ${DSERVER_PATH} ${INSTALL_PREFIX} ${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN} RelWithDebInfo
# make
if test -n "${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN}"; then source ${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN} fi
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_GUI_BUILD_POLICY}" = "clean" ]; then make clean fi make VERBOSE=1
if [ "${BUILD_LIBRARY_ONLY}" = "off" ]; then cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts/gui.RelWithDebInfo
fi
# strip and encrypt
if [ "${BUILD_LIBRARY_ONLY}" = "off" ]; then strip ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui
if test -n "${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME}"; then test_mtcrypt --encrypt ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui --out ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME} fi
cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME} ${WORKSPACE}/artifacts fi

hudson.tasks.Mailer.recipients: katte@weintek.com paul@weintek.com zen@weintek.com easonwu@weintek.com jeremyhong@weintek.com clydeliu@weintek.com
